rules.name: Consistent Component Structure
rules.description: All React components should follow the same structure with imports, component definition, and exports

rules.name: Tailwind Classes Organization
rules.description: Tailwind classes should be organized by category (layout, spacing, colors, typography)

rules.name: Framer Motion Animations
rules.description: Use consistent animation patterns with Framer Motion

rules.name: Color Palette Enforcement
rules.description: Use only the defined pastel color palette

rules.name: Image Optimization
rules.description: All images should use Next.js Image component with proper optimization
rules.pattern:
<Image
  src="/path/to/image.jpg"
  alt="Descriptive alt text"
  width={500}
  height={300}
  className="rounded-lg"
  priority={false}
  loading="lazy"
/>

rules.name: SEO Metadata
rules.description: Each page should include proper SEO metadata
rules.pattern:
<Head>
  <title>Page Title | Anushka Gupta</title>
  <meta name="description" content="Page description" />
  <meta property="og:title" content="Page Title | Anushka Gupta" />
  <meta property="og:description" content="Page description" />
  <meta property="og:image" content="/path/to/og-image.jpg" />
</Head>

rules.name: Responsive Design
rules.description: All components should use responsive design with mobile-first approach

rules.name: Consistent Typography
rules.description: Use defined typography classes for consistent text styling

rules.name: Component Props Documentation
rules.description: All component props should be documented with JSDoc
rules.pattern:
/**
 * ComponentName description
 * @param {PropType} propName - Description of the prop
 * @returns {JSX.Element} Component
 */

rules.name: Data Structure
rules.description: Data files should follow consistent structure

rules.name: Animation Performance
rules.description: Use will-change and hardware acceleration for animations

rules.name: Accessibility
rules.description: Ensure all interactive elements have proper accessibility attributes

rules.name: Contact Form Validation
rules.description: Implement proper form validation for contact form

rules.name: Project Card Structure
rules.description: Project cards should follow consistent structure
rules.pattern:
Project Title

Project description
